modName: The Magic of Food and Drink RnD Version - DELETED
summary: The ultimate extension of my Magic of Food and Drink Mod.
descriptionHtml:
Now I have been working on and off on a new version of my Magic of Food and Drink mod, until I realized the way I was going Realistic Needs and Diseases by  , had the perfect frame work. So I went about creating a new version of MoFad using RND as the core mechanic for the mod. 

[b][color=#93c47d][size=3]So what does this version of MOFAD do ?[/size][/color][/b]
[b]Ales & Mead -[/b] Buff Stamina
[b]Wines -[/b] Buff Magicka


[b][size=3]Required Mods[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75876/?]Realistic Needs and Diseases [/url]by Ro84

~
author: MisterB1969
